changeSet.comment: MO-1681 Rename Panel to Area in OperatingStatus table
changeSet.sql: UPDATE OPERATING_STATUS SET ECF_CLASS_ID = REPLACE(ECF_CLASS_ID, 'UndergroundPanel', 'UndergroundArea'); UPDATE OPERATING_STATUS SET REASON = REPLACE(REASON, 'Panel', 'Area');
